title.rendered: Reem Finance signs MoU with Aura

content.rendered: Reem Finance, one of the leading financial services institutions in the UAE, has signed a strategic MoU with Aura Finance, a fintech company dedicated to improving SME cash flow through innovative credit solutions, with the aim of leveraging Reem Finance’s advanced lending capabilities to expand Aura’s SME financing platform specifically within the UAE market.

excerpt.rendered: Reem Finance, one of the leading financial services institutions in the UAE, has signed a strategic MoU with Aura Finance, a fintech company dedicated to improving SME cash flow through innovative credit solutions, with the aim of leveraging Reem Finance’s advanced lending capabilities to expand Aura’s SME financing platform specifically within the UAE market.
